title: NCM & Impeachment to Parliament on Tuesday (3)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Samagi Jana Balawegaya says that the no-confidence motion and the impeachment motion will be brought to Parliament on Tuesday (03).
This was stated by Parliamentarian Harin Fernando while addressing the SJB May Day rally in Colombo, which is currently taking place at the Independence Square premises.
TN BJP Leader requests not to ‘politicize’ Sri Lanka aid package
